charges.charge_description: 21:846 CONSPIRACY TO DISTRIBUTE NARCOTICS, knowingly and intentionally did conspire to knowingly intentionally and unlawfully distribute and possess with intent to distribute 5 grams or more of cocaine base (commonly known as crack cocaine) a Schedule II controlled substance, and a quantity of marijuana, a Schedule I controlled substance in violation of 21:841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(B) and 841(b)(1)(D) (1)

18:922(g)(1), 924(a)(2) and 924(e) UNLAWFUL TRANSPORT OF FIREARMS, ETC., having been convicted of a crime punishable by imprisonment for a term exceeding one year, knowingly did possess in and affecting commerce, firearms and ammunition, all of which had been shipped and transported in interstate commerce (2)

21:841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(B) NARCOTICS-SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE and 18:2 Aid and Abet, knowingly intentionally and unlawfully did distribute and did possess with intent to distribuite 5 grams or more of cocaine base (commonly known as crack cocaine), a Schedule II controlled substance (3)

18:922(g)(1), 924(a)(2) and 924(e) UNLAWFUL TRANSPORT OF FIREARMS, ETC., having been convicted of a crime punishable by imprisonment for a term exceeding one year, knowingly did possess in and affecting commerce, firearms and ammunition, all of which had been shipped and transported in interstate commerce (4)

18:924(c)(1)(A) VIOLENT CRIME/DRUGS/MACHINE GUN and 18:2 Aid and Abet, knowingly did use and carry firearms during and in relation to and did possess the firearms in the furtherance of drug trafficking crimes named in counts 1 and 3 (5)

21:846 CONSPIRACY TO DISTRIBUTE NARCOTICS, knowingly and intentionally did conspire to knowingly intentionally and unlawfully distribute and possess with intent to distribute 5 grams or more of cocaine base (commonly known as crack cocaine) a Schedule II controlled substance, and a quantity of marijuana, a Schedule I controlled substance in violation of 21:841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(B) and 841(b)(1)(D) (1)

21:841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(B) NARCOTICS-SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE and 18:2 Aid and Abet, knowingly intentionally and unlawfully did distribute and did possess with intent to distribuite 5 grams or more of cocaine base (commonly known as crack cocaine), a Schedule II controlled substance (3)

18:924(c)(1)(A) VIOLENT CRIME/DRUGS/MACHINE GUN and 18:2 Aid and Abet, knowingly did use and carry firearms during and in relation to and did possess the firearms in the furtherance of drug trafficking crimes named in counts 1 and 3 (5)
